mapper.sql: id, parent_id, create_time, title, `name`, `level`, sort, `key`, icon, hidden, router
mapper.select:
select t.id,t.parent_id,t.create_time,t.title,t.name,t.level,t.sort,t.`key`,t.icon,t.hidden,t.router from system_menu t join system_role_menu_relation t1 on t1.menu_id = t.id join system_user_role_relation t2 on t2.role_id = t1.role_id join system_user t3 on t3.id = t2.user_id where 1=1 and t3.id = #{userId} group by t.id
UNION
select m.id,m.parent_id,m.create_time,m.title,m.name,m.level,m.sort,m.`key`,m.icon,m.hidden,m.router from ( select DISTINCT substring_index( substring_index(t1.parent,',',t2.id + 1), ',' ,-1 ) as parent from ( select t.id,getMenuParentList(t.id) parent from system_menu t join system_role_menu_relation t1 on t1.menu_id = t.id join system_user_role_relation t2 on t2.role_id = t1.role_id join system_user t3 on t3.id = t2.user_id where 1=1 and t3.id = #{userId} group by t.id ) t1 join help_index t2 on t2.id < (length(t1.parent) - length(REPLACE(t1.parent,',','')) + 1 ) ) t join system_menu m on m.id = t.parent
